metadata.title: CVE-2019-13452 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In Xymon through 4.3.28, a buffer overflow vulnerability exists inreportlog.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13452` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xymon - 4.3.29-1
xymon-client - 4.3.29-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xymon package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.29-1').
